Lamborghini Huracan 0-60 times

Autotk.com offers accurate information on Lamborghini Huracan 0-60 times and quarter mile from trusted sources. You may also keep track of how 0-60 times of Lamborghini Huracan changed across years and check out the model’s competitors with the same acceleration performance.

Our mission is to present an easy-to-read and comprehensive information on Lamborghini Huracan 0-60 mph and quarter mile for the devoted geeks, as it is an essential indicator of the vehicle power.

A single look at the Lamborghini Hurucan will take your emotions to another level of thrill and happiness. The exterior look is not only appealing but also attractive, to add on that it has a sporty look with a beautifully streamlined body to swerve through the air effortlessly.

The Lamborghini Hurucan premiered with the LP 610-4 coupe in 2014. Later on, in 2016, Lamborghini produced the Hurucan spyder. The spyder is different from the LP 610-4 coupe in that it is a convertible, but the performance is almost the same. Still, in 2016 there was another production of LP 580-2 coupe. This design was made to bring about lower costs compared to the first version. A small change in the HP which was reduced to 572 made a depreciation in the price. Likewise, there is still a spyder version of LP 580-2 coupe which is, of course, a convertible.  When it comes to the latest model, the Lamborghini Huracan LP 640-4 performance takes that position.

Every model of Lamborghini Huracan is equipped with a 5.2-liter V10 engine. The difference in the models comes in the horsepower. LP 640-4 comes first with an HP of 631; this gives it the acceleration of 0-60 in 2.9 seconds, the increase in the horsepower is brought about by a decrease in weight from the previous version of the coupe. LP 610-4 the first model of the Huracan, comes second with an HP of 602 taking the 0-60 acceleration in 3.2 seconds. Furthermore, the LP 610-4 coupe has a twin-clutch transmission which makes the gear systems automatic. As mentioned earlier, the Huracan LP 580-2 coupe has the lowest horsepower of 572; the brighter side is the 0-60 acceleration occurs in 3.4 seconds just the same as the LP 610-4.

When it comes to the exterior look, you have to admit that Lamborghini is given an appealing look and design. It is designed in a hexagonal shape which provides it with the stunning status. Moreover, the exterior body is made of aluminum and partly carbon fiber for the rear & front bumper and the side skirts. Aluminum brings in the advantage of having less weight to increase the performance. The lightest Huracan model is the performance 640-4 with a weight of about 1382kgs. Other versions have masses ranging from 1422kgs to 1553kgs; the difference is not that large as imagined.

Much is to be enjoyed by Lamborghini Huracan especially the speed and the acceleration it offers. It is a sports car, and speed is the least it could offer. Look and variation in colors is also another feature that will put a smile on your face. Lamborghini Huracan colors just look great especially during the day.

The downside of Lamborghini Hurucan is the high price. In addition to that, it consumes a lot of fuel when driving at the low gears.
